content: Indeed, Messer Marco. This inn is for honest folk, not for grand affairs. Speaking of steady places, I heard you're looking for a roof over your head. I might have a suitable spot, if you're interested in a fair arrangement.

Messer Marco, your thoughts on combining our practical insights with your artistic vision for significant returns are well-received. Indeed, I believe our combined efforts could yield much. As for prioritizing, I'd say a steady foundation is always the first step to any grand venture. My offer for a suitable spot still stands; a stable roof allows for clearer thinking and more focused work. Once that's settled, we can truly delve into the specifics of how our combined efforts can best prosper in Venice.
